name: The Archer (T.L.K.)
description:
The Archer (T.L.K.) is a free Arcade Shooter / Defense game designed for Mobile Android Devices. Play as an archer who is helping at the defense of the homeland against foul creatures!

*Shooting/Defense action in colorful fantasy 2d battlefields!

*Unlock multiple Upgrades to increase your Archer's effectiveness!

*Upgrade and use in the battle Calls and Scrolls against the enemy's waves!

*Unlock the secrets of the Altar, discover powerful Runes and organize Festivals!

*Fight the enemy's waves through 4 different main areas divided in 40 levels!

*Each Mission has Bronze, Silver and Gold difficulty! Can you achieve the Golden Victory?

*Unlock Beastiary Entries to learn more about your enemy!

*Check your progress through 21 Achievements (supporting Google Play Services)!

*No in game purchases or any locked feature but has an optional Ad System Just download and play!

And remember, at dark times even a single soldier can change the path of history...
